Question: This person began work on his third studio album The 20/20 Experience in June 2012, with "no rules and/or end goal in mind".
Hints: This person also appears in the music video, which was directed by Jonas & François.
When recording the 2005 single "Signs" with Snoop Dogg, this person discovered a throat condition.
